name: 4X4 Masters (itch)
description:
This is an Off Road game, not an arcade car race game! You can ride with different cars, SUVs, off road cars with 4X4 drive in open levels. The arrow help to you to find the best way. In the multiplayer section available all single player levels for multiplayer race.

A short ingame video:

You can host or join to multiplayer races.

Features:
12 Single player levels.
12 PvP multiplayer levels
PvP multiplayer in different operation systems. At moment available the PC versions. Mac Linux version coming soon.
7 different cars with different setup, different driving assistance systems, ABS, ESP and TCS.
Open Levels to find the best way, short cut track for the best time in some levels.
TPS, wheel, cockpit and external cameras for each cars and levels for the better view.
Working dashboard.
Deformable cars.
Realistic car physics.
